qas.question: During what time period did the Dominican Order do its best work?
What was one reason why the Dominican Order was established?
The head of the Dominican Order is known as what?
Who is the current Master of the Order?
What is the Order of Preachers known for?

plausible_answers.text: to preach the Gospel and to combat heresy

qas.question: What  was the order not founded to do?

plausible_answers.text: the teaching activity of the order and its scholastic organization

qas.question: What did not place the Preachers in the forefront of the intellectual life of the Middle Ages?

plausible_answers.text: its intellectual tradition, having produced many leading theologians and philosophers.

qas.question: What was the order not famed for?
Who headed the Dominican order in 1980?

plausible_answers.text: Ordinis Praedicatorum, meaning of the Order of Preachers

qas.question: What does O.P. not stand for>

context: Founded <b5_0>to preach the Gospel and <a1_0>to combat heresy<b5_0/><a1_0/>, <b6_0>the teaching activity of the order and its scholastic organization<b6_0/> placed the Preachers in the forefront of the intellectual life of <a0_0>the Middle Ages<a0_0/>. The order is famed for <a4_0><b7_0>its intellectual tradition<a4_0/>, having produced many leading theologians and philosophers.<b7_0/> The Dominican Order is headed by the <a2_0>Master of the Order<a2_0/>, who is currently <a3_0><b8_0>Bruno Cadoré<b8_0/><a3_0/>.
